sequences.description: Section heading 'Shaping the future of network defense'
Paragraph explaining the service with 'How it works' subheading
Diagram/image showing how the service works in the network
Heading 'Try AT&T Dynamic Defense Advanced or Premium—on us—for two months' with promotional text
Three pricing tier cards showing AT&T Dynamic Defense, AT&T Dynamic Defense Advanced, and AT&T Dynamic Defense Premium with features and pricing
Heading 'Choose the plan that's right for your business'
Comparison table showing features across different plan tiers with checkmarks

sections.description: Success story/testimonial section with dark background

sequences.description: Two-column layout: Left side has large statistic '229 million threats blocked in 24 hours' with descriptive text and CTA button; Right side has image
Heading 'Always-on security that scales with you'
Five feature cards in a grid, each with icon and text describing security capabilities
Heading 'We've got the industry talking'
Award cards showing Gartner, Frost & Sullivan, and other industry recognition
Heading 'Learn more about AT&T Dynamic Defense'
Resource cards with images, titles, and links to additional content
Heading 'Frequently asked questions'
Expandable questions and answers in accordion format
Heading 'Talk to an AT&T Business sales expert' with phone number and contact info, plus hours of operation
